p: The first identified MERS case (Case #1) was a male gentleman in his 40s-who presented to an outside hospital with acute myocardial infarction, he was transferred to our institution for coronary artery bypass grafting. On the first post-operative day he was extubated and during the ensuing days he mobilized well and socialized with other patients in neighbouring rooms in the cardiac surgery ward including patients who were later identified as Case #2 and Case #3.
